Author: WillWolf76 & The Redheaded Witch
Name: Fashion Report
Punchline: Calculates your points prior to speaking with Masked Rose for the Gold Saucer mini game while also giving you the proper themed pieces that would work!
Description:
Fashion Report with point calculation system.
Once you check in to see the fashion report for the week, the window will check your gear and tell you how many points you will earn based on what you are wearing.
This doesn't include the bonus calculations for Dyes ... YET (Future update planned)!

/fr - opens up main window.
/fashionreport - Main Window

This project was made possible by a woman who took the time to figure out the proper pointing system and organize the fashion report data for me. She is the heart of this project.

Future Updates:
Dye Calculation
list of all themed armor pieces with clickable links.
Automatic teleporting and moving to NPCs that sell pieces.
